summary.span: 命名空間提供企業應用程式的重要基礎結構。

span.span: The namespace provides an important infrastructure for enterprise applications.

summary.span: COM+ 替部署於企業環境的元件程式撰寫模型 (Programming Model) 提供服務架構。

span.span: COM+ provides a services architecture for component programming models deployed in an enterprise environment.

summary.span: 這個命名空間會為 .NET 物件提供 COM+ 服務的存取，使得 .NET Framework 物件對企業應用程式而言更為實際。

span.span: This namespace provides .NET objects with access to COM+ services making the .NET Framework objects more practical for enterprise applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用資訊，請參閱[撰寫的服務元件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f109ee24-81ad-4d99-9892-51ac6f34978c)For information about using , see [Writing Serviced Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f109ee24-81ad-4d99-9892-51ac6f34978c)
